NewVenice.when_to_pick: При 3+ oceans и steel для оплаты. Quad тег делает карту ценной в Pathfinders.

NobelLabs.name: NobelLabs
NobelLabs.economy: 11 MC total (8+3). Req 4 Science tags. Action: +2 microbes/data/floaters to ANY card. Science тег. Repeatable resource placement.
NobelLabs.reasoning: Req 4 Science тегов — строгое ограничение. Когда playable, action добавляет 2 resources per turn — ценно для VP cards (Decomposers, Tardigrades, data VP cards). Но 4 Science requirement + Science тег only = narrow. Action value ~4-6 MC per use на хороших targets. Без good targets — waste. С Habitat Marte — легче play.
NobelLabs.when_to_pick: При 3+ Science тегах + resource VP cards. С Habitat Marte — значительно лучше.

OrbitalLaboratories.name: OrbitalLaboratories
OrbitalLaboratories.economy: 21 MC total (18+3), ti payable. +2 plant-prod (16 MC) + 1 plant (~1.5 MC). Triple tag (Science, Plant, Space). Total: ~17.5 MC production value.
OrbitalLaboratories.reasoning: 2 plant-prod за 21 MC = 10.5 MC/prod — выше среднего даже с ti payable. Triple tag (Science, Plant, Space) ценен для треков, но production efficiency mediocre. Ti payable снижает реальную стоимость до ~15-18 MC. 1 plant = minor bonus. Без ti дисконта — слабо. С ti — на грани B-tier. Теги спасают.
OrbitalLaboratories.when_to_pick: При наличии ti для оплаты и plant strategy. Triple тег — main value.

OumuamuaTypeObjectSurvey.name: OumuamuaTypeObjectSurvey
OumuamuaTypeObjectSurvey.economy: 23 MC total (20+3), ti payable. Req: 1 Space + 1 Science tag. +2 data to ANY card. Space+Science теги. Description truncated — likely more effects. 2 data = ~4-6 MC value.
OumuamuaTypeObjectSurvey.reasoning: 20 MC за 2 data + описание обрезано. Если только 2 data — это ужасная сделка (23 MC за ~5 MC). Space+Science теги помогают, но не компенсируют. Req Space + Science tag = обычно выполнимо. Ti payable снижает стоимость. Вероятно есть дополнительные effects (description truncated), что может поднять оценку. На основе видимых данных — weak.
OumuamuaTypeObjectSurvey.when_to_pick: Вероятно лучше, чем видно из truncated description. На основе данных — weak.

OzoneGenerators.name: OzoneGenerators
OzoneGenerators.economy: 17 MC total (14+3), ti payable. Req O2 ≥6%. Action: spend 3 energy → 1 TR (7 MC). 3 energy = ~9-10 MC value. Net: -2 to -3 MC per action. Mars+Space теги.
OzoneGenerators.reasoning: Action economy отрицательная — 3 energy (9-10 MC) за 1 TR (7 MC). Но при energy surplus это converts worthless energy into TR. Mars+Space теги продвигают Mars track. Req O2 6% = mid game. Ti payable снижает стоимость. Полезна как TR engine при Thorgate/energy surplus builds. Stall value bonus.
OzoneGenerators.when_to_pick: При energy surplus и нужда в TR. Energy → TR conversion — not efficient but usable.

Pollinators.name: Pollinators
Pollinators.economy: 22 MC total (19+3). Req 3 Plant tags. +1 plant-prod (8 MC) + 2 MC-prod (10-12 MC). Action: +1 animal to this. VP per animal (ratio unclear, likely 1 VP/animal). Plant+Animal теги. 4-5 animals = 4-5 VP.
Pollinators.reasoning: Хорошая payoff карта для Plant strategy — 3 Plant tags requirement = нужен commitment. Production package (plant + 2 MC) solid. Action: free animal per turn = passive VP accumulator (4-5 VP typical). Plant+Animal теги ценны (NRA, Ecologist). Req 3 Plant tags обычно выполнимо в plant builds gen 3-4.
Pollinators.when_to_pick: При 2+ Plant тегах уже в engine. Free animal action = passive VP.

PowerPlant.name: PowerPlant
PowerPlant.economy: 16 MC total (13+3), steel payable. +2 heat-prod (8 MC) + 1 energy-prod (7.5 MC). Triple tag (Mars, Power, Building). Total: 15.5 MC production. Steel payable: ~12-13 MC real cost.
PowerPlant.reasoning: Triple tag (Mars, Power, Building) ценен в Pathfinders — Mars track advancement + steel payable. Production mix (heat + energy) = mediocre, heat-prod наименее ценная. С steel payment реальная стоимость ~12-13 MC за 15.5 MC production = borderline okay. Triple тег — основная ценность. Generic filler card.
PowerPlant.when_to_pick: Как дешёвый triple tag для Mars track. Production mediocre но acceptable с steel.

PrefabricationofHumanHabitats.name: PrefabricationofHumanHabitats
PrefabricationofHumanHabitats.economy: 11 MC total (8+3), steel payable. Req: steel production. Effect: city cards -2 MC + city SP -2 MC + steel usable on city cards. Building+City теги. 3-5 city triggers = 6-10 MC saved + steel on cities.
PrefabricationofHumanHabitats.reasoning: Enabler для city strategy — -2 MC на city cards и SP + steel usable на cities (обычно нельзя). При 3-4 cities = 6-8 MC saved + steel payment on city cards (huge). Cheap (8 MC, steel payable = ~5-6 MC real). Building+City теги для milestones. Req steel production — обычно выполнимо. Отличная с city-heavy strategy.
PrefabricationofHumanHabitats.when_to_pick: При city strategy с 2+ cities planned. Steel on cities = game changing discount.

PrivateSecurity.name: PrivateSecurity
PrivateSecurity.economy: 11 MC total (8+3). Effect: opponents can't remove your production. Earth тег. Protection value varies: 0 MC (no attacks in game) to 10-15 MC (multiple attacks blocked).
PrivateSecurity.reasoning: Defensive card с непредсказуемой value. В 3P take-that карты слабее, значит меньше production removal — PrivateSecurity часто не окупается. 11 MC за insurance policy = risky. Earth тег единственная стабильная ценность. В games без attack cards = 11 MC wasted. Meta-dependent.
PrivateSecurity.when_to_pick: Если видишь attack cards у оппонентов. Иначе Earth тег не стоит 11 MC.

PublicSponsoredGrant.name: PublicSponsoredGrant
PublicSponsoredGrant.economy: 9 MC total (6+3). Req Scientists ruling/2 delegates. All players lose 2 MC. Draw 2 cards with chosen tag (3.5 MC each = 7 MC). Net: 7 MC - 9 MC - 2 MC loss = -4 MC + targeted card draw. No tags.
PublicSponsoredGrant.reasoning: Targeted card draw — choose tag and draw 2 matching cards. 2 cards worth ~7 MC, but cost 9 MC + 2 MC self-loss = net negative economically. НО targeted draw ценнее random — getting exactly what you need for strategy. No tags + all players lose 2 MC = downsides. Scientists requirement ограничивает. Niche utility card.
PublicSponsoredGrant.when_to_pick: Когда Scientists ruling и нужны specific тег карты для strategy. No tags penalty.

RareEarthElements.name: RareEarthElements
RareEarthElements.economy: 8 MC total (5+3). +1 MC-prod per special tile on Mars. Earth+Mars теги. Special tiles (Nuclear Zone, Restricted Area, Lava Flows, etc.) typically 0-2 per player. At 2 special tiles = 2 MC-prod (10-12 MC).
RareEarthElements.reasoning: Очень дешёвая карта (5 MC) с Earth+Mars двойным тегом — отличная для track advancement. Но MC-prod зависит от special tiles, которых обычно 0-2. Floor: 0 MC-prod за 8 MC + tags = acceptable for tag value alone. Ceiling: 3+ special tiles = 15+ MC value. Двойной тег спасает даже при 0 special tiles.
RareEarthElements.when_to_pick: Дёшевый двойной тег. При 1+ special tiles — okay. При 0 — покупаешь только теги.

RedCity.name: RedCity
RedCity.economy: 24 MC total (21+3), steel payable. Req Reds ruling/2 delegates. City tile. Special VP. City+Building теги. City value: MC-prod adjacency (~5-8 MC). Special VP depends on implementation.
RedCity.reasoning: City + special VP при Reds ruling — niche Turmoil card. Steel payable снижает стоимость. City+Building теги для milestones. Requirement Reds ruling ограничивает — Reds обычно anti-terraform, что конфликтует с most strategies. Special VP potentially strong if based on non-TR elements. Situational but can be good.
RedCity.when_to_pick: При Reds influence и city plans. Steel payable. Situational.

ReturntoAbandonedTechnology.name: ReturntoAbandonedTechnology
ReturntoAbandonedTechnology.economy: 7 MC total (4+3). Draw top 4 from discard, keep 2, discard rest. Mars тег. 2 cards (~7 MC) + Mars тег. But discard pile quality unpredictable.
ReturntoAbandonedTechnology.reasoning: Дешёвый event — 7 MC за 2 карты + Mars тег. 2 карты из discard = quality varies wildly. В ранней игре discard мало карт. В поздней — хороший выбор но карты менее полезны. Mars тег для track. Net: 7 MC cards - 7 MC cost = breakeven + Mars тег value. Okay filler, но unpredictable quality.
ReturntoAbandonedTechnology.when_to_pick: Mid-to-late game когда discard pile большой. Дёшевый Mars тег + card draw.

RichDeposits.name: RichDeposits
RichDeposits.economy: 15 MC total (12+3). Req 2 Science tags. +3 steel-prod (24 MC). No tags. Net: 24 - 15 = 9 MC profit, minus no-tag penalty (-3 to -5).
RichDeposits.reasoning: 3 steel-prod за 15 MC = 5 MC/steel-prod = хорошая efficiency. НО: no tags = -3 to -5 penalty, и requirement 2 Science тегов ограничивает. При Science build с Building cards — сильная synergy. Without tags, no track advancement, no synergies. Raw production efficiency спасает. Break-even с penalty.
RichDeposits.when_to_pick: При 2+ Science тегов и Building-heavy engine. No tags penalty is significant.

SecretLabs.name: SecretLabs
SecretLabs.economy: 24 MC total (21+3), ti/steel payable. Req: 1 Science + 1 Jovian tag. Triple tag (Jovian, Building, Space). 1 VP (5 MC). Description truncated — likely choice effect.
SecretLabs.reasoning: Triple tag (Jovian, Building, Space) — ценный для Jovian track. 1 VP бонус. Ti payable + steel payable (Building тег) значительно снижают стоимость. Req Science + Jovian — requires specific build. Description truncated, likely has production/resource choice. Tags + VP + payability = decent.
SecretLabs.when_to_pick: При Jovian+Science build. Triple тег + VP + dual payability.

SmallComet.name: SmallComet
SmallComet.economy: 35 MC total (32+3), ti payable. Every player loses 2 plants. +1 temp TR (7 MC) + 1 O2 TR (7 MC) + ocean. Total TR: ~14 MC + ocean (~7 MC). Mars+Space теги. Grand total: ~21 MC.
SmallComet.reasoning: 35 MC (ti payable) за 2 TR + ocean + symmetric plant attack. 21 MC value за 35 MC = terrible ratio. Ti payable critical — при 10 ti real cost ~20-23 MC, что acceptable. Plant attack в 3P = take-that element, но symmetric (all players) делает его менее вредным. Mars+Space теги для tracks. Без ti дисконта — D-tier.
SmallComet.when_to_pick: Только с significant ti для оплаты. Без ti — слишком дорого для 2 TR.

SmallOpenPitMine.name: SmallOpenPitMine
SmallOpenPitMine.economy: 13 MC total (10+3), steel payable. Choice: +2 steel-prod (16 MC) OR +1 ti-prod (12.5 MC). Building тег. Best case: 16 MC value. Steel payable = ~9-10 MC real.
SmallOpenPitMine.reasoning: Flexible production card — choose steel or ti production based on need. 2 steel-prod (16 MC) за ~10 MC (steel payable) = 6.25 MC/steel-prod = хорошо. 1 ti-prod (12.5 MC) за ~10 MC = 10 MC/ti-prod = okay. Building тег for steel payment is key. No other tags, но Building alone = acceptable. Solid early game production.
SmallOpenPitMine.when_to_pick: Early game production card. Steel payable makes it efficient. Choose based on engine need.

SocialEvents.name: SocialEvents
SocialEvents.economy: 18+3=21 MC. Gain 1 TR per 2 Mars tags (including this). С 3 Mars тегами = 1 TR (7 MC). С 5 = 2 TR (14 MC). Realistically 1-2 TR. Earth+Mars теги.
SocialEvents.reasoning: Mars тегов мало (только Pathfinders). Реально к моменту розыгрыша будет 2-4 Mars тега = 1-2 TR за 21 MC. Efficiency 10.5-21 MC/TR = плохо-средне. Earth тег спасает немного (Point Luna). Сильно зависит от того, сколько Mars карт уже сыграно.
SocialEvents.when_to_pick: Только при 4+ Mars тегах уже в игре. Иначе слишком дорого за 1 TR.

SoilDetoxification.name: SoilDetoxification
SoilDetoxification.economy: 13 MC total (10+3). Req Greens ruling/2 delegates. +1 plant-prod (8 MC). Effect: greenery SP costs 1 plant less (7 plants instead of 8). Plant+Science теги. 3-4 greeneries saved = 3-4 MC.
SoilDetoxification.reasoning: Plant-prod + greenery discount = plant strategy enabler. Но requirement Greens ruling ограничивает timing. -1 plant on greenery SP = minor benefit (saves ~1 MC equivalent per greenery). Plant+Science теги ценны. Total value: 8 MC prod + 3-4 MC discount = 11-12 MC за 13 MC. Barely breakeven с tag value.
SoilDetoxification.when_to_pick: При Greens influence + plant strategy. Minor but consistent discount.

SolarStorm.name: SolarStorm
SolarStorm.economy: 15 MC total (12+3), ti payable. Every player loses 2 plants + remove up to 3 data from any player. Space тег. Take-that card in 3P.
SolarStorm.reasoning: Take-that event в 3P — помогает третьему игроку бесплатно. 15 MC за symmetric plant attack + data removal = terrible value. Нет TR, нет production, нет VP. Space тег единственная positive. Data removal может быть impactful vs data-heavy strategies, но 15 MC слишком дорого для disruption. В 3P take-that cards are weak.
SolarStorm.when_to_pick: Почти никогда. 15 MC за pure disruption в 3P = bad. Only if desperately need Space тег.

Solarpedia.name: Solarpedia
Solarpedia.economy: 15 MC total (12+3), ti payable. Req: Venus + Earth + Mars + Jovian tags. +2 data to ANY. Action: +2 data to ANY. VP: 1 per 6 data. Space тег. Very strict requirement.
Solarpedia.reasoning: Quadruple tag requirement (Venus, Earth, Mars, Jovian) — одно из самых строгих в игре. Когда playable, action +2 data per turn = strong data engine. Но VP ratio 1 per 6 data = slow (need 12 data for 2 VP). Space тег для ti payable. Requirement makes this unplayable in most games. С правильным engine — decent action card.
Solarpedia.when_to_pick: Только при наличии ВСЕХ четырёх planetary тегов. Otherwise dead card.

SpaceDebrisCleaningOperation.name: SpaceDebrisCleaningOperation
SpaceDebrisCleaningOperation.economy: 10 MC total (7+3), ti payable. Req ANY 4 Space tags in play. +3 titanium (9-15 MC). Mars+Space теги. Net: 9-15 MC ti + tags - 10 MC = breakeven to good. Req usually met mid game.
SpaceDebrisCleaningOperation.reasoning: 3 titanium за 10 MC (ti payable) = дёшево при наличии Space tags. Mars+Space теги для tracks. Req ANY 4 Space tags (включая других игроков) — обычно met к gen 3-4 в 3P. Ti payable снижает стоимость до ~5-7 MC real. Good ti burst для дорогой Space карты. Solid filler event.
SpaceDebrisCleaningOperation.when_to_pick: При Space-heavy game (4+ Space tags в play). Дёшевый ti burst + dual тег.

SpaceRelay.name: SpaceRelay
SpaceRelay.economy: 16 MC total (13+3), ti payable. +1 MC-prod (5-6 MC). Effect: draw card per Jovian tag played (incl this). Space+Jovian теги. Card draw = 3.5 MC per Jovian tag. 3-5 Jovian tags = 10-17 MC card draw value.
SpaceRelay.reasoning: Mini-Jovian version of Point Luna (Earth тег → card draw). +1 MC-prod + card draw per Jovian tag = strong engine. При 3+ Jovian тегах = 10+ MC card draw + 5 MC prod = great ROI. Space+Jovian теги продвигают Jovian track (2 steps!). Ti payable. Jovian tags реже чем Earth, но с Pathfinders больше Jovian cards.
SpaceRelay.when_to_pick: При Jovian strategy. 2+ Jovian тега planned = strong. Ti payable. Card draw engine.

SpecializedSettlement.name: SpecializedSettlement
SpecializedSettlement.economy: 23 MC total (20+3), steel payable. -1 energy-prod (-7.5 MC). +3 MC-prod (15-18 MC) + city tile (~5-8 MC). Triple tag (City, Building, Mars). Net: 12.5-18.5 MC production. Steel payable: ~17-18 MC real cost.
SpecializedSettlement.reasoning: Solid city card — 3 MC-prod + city за energy conversion. Triple tag (City, Building, Mars) ценен для Mars track, Mayor milestone, steel payment. Steel payable критически снижает стоимость. Net production (3 MC-prod - 1 energy-prod = +2 effective) + city tile = good value. Comparable to Open City but with Mars тег.
SpecializedSettlement.when_to_pick: При energy production и city strategy. Steel payable. Mars тег bonus.

TerraformingControlStation.name: TerraformingControlStation
TerraformingControlStation.economy: 18+3=21 MC. 2 TR immediate (14-14.8 MC). Discount -2 MC на Venus и Mars теги. Venus теги есть во всех Venus-дополнениях (~30 карт). Mars discount — бонус (только PF). Triple тег: Venus+Mars+Space. Ti payable.
TerraformingControlStation.reasoning: 2 TR за 21 MC = хорошая base rate (10.5 MC/TR). Venus discount работает хорошо (Venus карт достаточно). Mars discount — минорный бонус. Triple тег отличный. Снижаем с A до B из-за Mars компонента и 21 MC upfront cost.
TerraformingControlStation.when_to_pick: Venus стратегия + тройной тег. Mars discount = бонус. 2 TR immediate всегда ценно.

TerraformingRobots.name: TerraformingRobots
TerraformingRobots.economy: 10+3=13 MC. Requires 4 Science tags. Triggers on Mars tags: add 1 robot. Robots = VP? Двойная проблема: 4 Science req + Mars-tag trigger.
TerraformingRobots.reasoning: Requires 4 Science tags — уже niche. А triggers ТОЛЬКО на Mars теги, которых мало. Даже выполнив requirement, за игру сыграешь 1-2 Mars карты = 1-2 robots. Ценность robots неясна. Двойная зависимость (Science req + Mars trigger) делает карту почти мёртвой.
TerraformingRobots.when_to_pick: Почти никогда. Двойное условие слишком ограничивает.

ThinkTank.name: ThinkTank
ThinkTank.economy: 15 MC total (12+3). Triple tag (Mars, Venus, Science). Action: spend 2 MC → +1 data to any card. Effect: remove data to pay for cards (as MC). Data = flexible MC storage. Triple tag value.
ThinkTank.reasoning: Тройной тег (Mars, Venus, Science) = 3 track steps + massive synergy potential. Data banking — store MC as data, spend when needed. 2 MC → 1 data → 1 MC equivalent on card = net -1 MC per data, BUT timing flexibility has value. Triple tag is the real star — tracks + Habitat Marte + Venus synergies. Cheap at 12 MC for triple tag.
ThinkTank.when_to_pick: Для тройного тега в Mars/Venus/Science strategy. Data banking — secondary benefit.

VeneraBase.name: VeneraBase
VeneraBase.economy: 24 MC total (21+3). Req Unity ruling/2 delegates. +3 MC-prod (15-18 MC) + city on reserved area. Double Venus + City tags. VP: 1 per Venus tag. Action: +1 floater to any Venus card. 3-4 Venus tags = 3-4 VP (15-20 MC).
VeneraBase.reasoning: Мощная Venus payoff — city + 3 MC-prod + VP per Venus tag + floater action. Double Venus тег = 2 Venus track steps. Unity requirement ограничивает, но Unity = space/venus party = natural fit. City on reserved area guaranteed. При 4 Venus тегах = 4 VP + city + 3 MC-prod = ~35-40 MC value. Strong in Venus builds.
VeneraBase.when_to_pick: При Venus strategy + Unity influence. Double Venus тег + city = strong.

Wetlands.name: Wetlands
Wetlands.economy: 23 MC total (20+3). Req 2 oceans. -4 plants. Place special tile (greenery + ocean hybrid). +1 O2 (TR 7 MC) + 1 TR (7 MC) + 1 VP (5 MC). Total: 19 MC TR/VP. Net: 19 - 23 - 4 plants (6 MC) = -10 MC. BUT dual tile type + Mars+Plant теги.
Wetlands.reasoning: Уникальная карта — greenery + ocean hybrid tile. 2 TR + 1 VP = 19 MC, но 23 MC cost + 4 plants loss = expensive. Однако tile counts as BOTH greenery AND ocean — triggers ocean bonuses (Lakefront Resorts, Arctic Algae) + greenery bonuses. Mars+Plant теги для tracks. Counts toward ocean placement rewards. Strategic value beyond raw numbers.
Wetlands.when_to_pick: При ocean/greenery synergies (Lakefront, Arctic Algae). Dual tile type = unique value.

Spin-inducing Asteroid.name: Spin-inducing Asteroid
Spin-inducing Asteroid.economy: 2 Venus TR за 19 MC. Ti payable.
Spin-inducing Asteroid.reasoning: 2 Venus TR. Ti payable снижает cost. Event тег.
